option.adrenalin.enable.tooltip: Turns on adrenaline-induced time stall. It is not synchronized between server and client; when ReplayMod is installed, if it is on when playing and off when replaying, it will behave as if it is not time-stagnated at all. Maybe.
Specifies the time stagnation rate as a percentage. 0.5 is 50%.
option.adrenalin.adrenalin_decay.tooltip: The time it takes for the adrenaline to decay and the time stagnation to be released. 1 second at 20.
option.adrenalin.low_health_threshold.to: When the ratio of maximum strength to strength falls below this, adrenaline begins to be released. 0.5 is 50%.
option.adrenalin.continuous_damage_thres: When the ratio of maximum strength to damage sustained over a period of time is greater than this, adrenaline begins to be released. 0.5 is 50%.
option.adrenalin.continuous_damage_decay: It is the time it takes for the sum of the maximum strength and the percentage of damage to reach 0. 20 is 1 second.
Only server-side processing is time-stagnant based on chunks, not worlds. This is intended for use in a multi This is an experimental setup.
